law.text: The commissioner shall make an examination into the affairs of the association at least annually. Such examination shall be conducted and the report thereon filed in the manner prescribed in KRS Chapter 304, Subtitle 2. The expenses of such examinations shall be paid by the association in the manner prescribed by that subtitle.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1544, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 249, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 12, effective June 19, 1976.
